TopicTitle: (I'm Back After Like 3 Months) Business Jet

Articles.Content:
I installed the Airplane Plus mod today and wanted to use some of the parts on a business jet, so I did. It has conventional landing gear and an APU, so cool?
Also, sorry for the long absence from the forums, my ksp interest started to die out, but I recently got back into it, so yeah. Don't worry, the Orbital Mammoths are still launching!

 

Craft file: https://kerbalx.com/Nicodo123/Business-Jet

 

(I would provide a picture, but the forum won't let me embed it)
